name: dkseer_illus_02
text: Combat is the art of deception.
text_simple: combat is the art of deception

name: dkseer_inthebag_02
text: The writing is on the wall.
text_simple: the writing is on the wall

name: dkseer_kill_01
text: Your life, much like your head, lacked a point.
text_simple: your life much like your head lacked a point

name: dkseer_kill_04
text: How could it be any other way.
text_simple: how could it be any other way

name: dkseer_kill_06
text: Battle is a spring rain. It fills shallow graves.
text_simple: battle is a spring rain it fills shallow graves

name: dkseer_kill_07
text: The roundness of your head is revolting.
text_simple: the roundness of your head is revolting

name: dkseer_kill_09
text: The rules of battle dictate your demise.
text_simple: the rules of battle dictate your demise

name: dkseer_kill_10
text: A pointless life for a pointless head.
text_simple: a pointless life for a pointless head

text: Did my head just get pointier?

name: dkseer_move_10
text: Speed is the heart of battle.
text_simple: speed is the heart of battle

name: dkseer_move_11
text: I see where this road ends.
text_simple: i see where this road ends

name: dkseer_move_12
text: A mind sharper than any blade.
text_simple: a mind sharper than any blade

name: dkseer_purch_01
text: This will drive them up a wall.
text_simple: this will drive them up a wall

name: dkseer_rare_01
text: If your enemy is equal, prepare for him. If greater, elude him. If weaker, crush him.
text_simple: if your enemy is equal prepare for him if greater elude him if weaker crush him

name: dkseer_rare_02
text: We are not so different, my enemies and I. Except my brain is much larger.
text_simple: we are not so different my enemies and i except my brain is much larger

name: dkseer_rare_03
text: My enemies did the best they could with what they had, which wasn't much.
text_simple: my enemies did the best they could with what they had which wasnt much

name: dkseer_rare_04
text: No, I will not calm my beard.
text_simple: no i will not calm my beard

name: dkseer_rare_05
text: To the great Damathryx, I devote my existence.
text_simple: to the great damathryx i devote my existence

name: dkseer_respawn_02
text: Victory is the goal, not glorious battles.
text_simple: victory is the goal not glorious battles

name: dkseer_respawn_03
text: I know my enemy as I know myself.
text_simple: i know my enemy as i know myself

name: dkseer_respawn_04
text: From darkness, I surge to life.
text_simple: from darkness i surge to life

name: dkseer_respawn_05
text: In battle, avoid what is sharp. Puncture what is soft.
text_simple: in battle avoid what is sharp puncture what is soft

name: dkseer_respawn_06
text: My humiliation is seared into memory.
text_simple: my humiliation is seared into memory

name: dkseer_respawn_07
text: I return from the land beyond the wall.
text_simple: i return from the land beyond the wall

name: dkseer_respawn_09
text: Ohh, now the roundheads shall pay.
text_simple: ohh now the roundheads shall pay

name: dkseer_respawn_10
text: Death is a wall I have overleapt.
text_simple: death is a wall i have overleapt

name: dkseer_rival_01
text: Couldn't see the forest...for the trees.
text_simple: couldnt see the forest for the trees

name: dkseer_rival_03
text: Tiny, I'll build a wall from your stones.
text_simple: tiny ill build a wall from your stones

name: dkseer_rival_05
text: You're no peer of the seer.
text_simple: youre no peer of the seer

name: dkseer_rival_06
text: Phantom Lancer, I've seen your end.
text_simple: phantom lancer ive seen your end

name: dkseer_rival_09
text: Shadow Shaman, I've seen your end.
text_simple: shadow shaman ive seen your end

name: dkseer_spawn_03
text: An enemy destroyed cannot rise against you.
text_simple: an enemy destroyed cannot rise against you

name: dkseer_spawn_05
text: From the land behind the wall, I come.
text_simple: from the land behind the wall i come

name: dkseer_win_04
text: The great wall shall stand forever.
text_simple: the great wall shall stand forever
